How do I remove someone from content?

Admins can remove someone who is assigned from content.

  1. Go to the relevant content.
  2. Click on one of the assigned team members avatars to the top-right of the content.
  3. This will popup the Assigned users window, where you can see more detail about Who is assigned, what stage they are up to, and how long ago the last activity happened.
  4. Click the Remove button.
